contest-event.event-date: Oct. 17, 1970 D National Mineworkers (Second Section) National Mineworkers (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-second-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Second Variations for Brass Band [Vaughan Williams] Winter Gardens (Pavilion Theatre), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 11 bands competed. 9th annual contest. March 25, 2013, 8:44 p.m. Oct. 19, 2015, 9:18 a.m. 1 Rockingham Band Edmund Hoole 2 Langwith Miners Welfare George Thorpe 3 Brodsworth Colliery Band Ken Johnson 4 Felling Band George Rowell Unknown Result Coedely W.
